definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Wind erosion is a fundamental form of desert.
sentences.chinese: 风蚀是造成土壤荒漠化的一种主要形式。

sentences.english: Over-grazing has damaged the vegetation cover of this area, and the land is beginning to show signs of desertification.
sentences.chinese: 过度的放牧使该地区被覆遭到破坏，土地开始荒漠化。

sentences.english: Overgrazing is the major cause of desertification worldwide.
sentences.chinese: 过度放牧是主要的原因，全球防治荒漠化。

sentences.english: Programmes by the United Nations Convention to Combat Desertification were underfunded, she said.
sentences.chinese: 联合国的防治荒漠化国际公约项目资金不足，她说。

sentences.english: Under the natural conditions, the central subtropical zone of China is impossible to be desertified.
sentences.chinese: 我国中亚热带在自然条件下不会荒漠化。

sentences.english: Karst rocky desertification is a major kind of land desertification.
sentences.chinese: 喀斯特石漠化是土地荒漠化的主要类型之一。

sentences.english: Microbiotic soil crust exists in desertification-prone areas.
sentences.chinese: 生物土壤结皮在荒漠化地区广为分布。

sentences.english: Local herdsmen face the challenge of irrigating their crops and desertification of the grassland.
sentences.chinese: 当地牧民面临着灌溉庄稼的难题和草原荒漠化的挑战。

sentences.english: Africa especially faces the risk of desertification.
sentences.chinese: 非洲尤其要面对土壤荒漠化的危险。

sentences.english: Soil desertification has become the world's most serious environmental problems.
sentences.chinese: 土壤荒漠化已成为全球最严重的环境问题之一。

sentences.english: Biological soil crust exists in desertification prone areas.
sentences.chinese: 生物土壤结皮在荒漠化地区广泛分布。

sentences.english: Land degradation and desertification can affect human health through complex pathways.
sentences.chinese: 土地退化和荒漠化可通过复杂的途径影响人类健康。
土壤荒漠化是一个过程。

sentences.english: Results showed that the desertification control efficiency mainly shows a tendency to rise in the whole county.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，河曲县的荒漠化防治效益以上升趋势为主。

sentences.english: Sahel in West Africa is the most serious desertified zone in the world.
sentences.chinese: 西非萨赫勒地带是世界上最严重的荒漠化地区。

sentences.english: The climate is worsening, with deforestation and desertification still on the march.
sentences.chinese: 气候恶化，森林砍伐和荒漠化仍在继续。
